steps_required.title: Set up LLM Backbone
steps_required.description: Configure and deploy the selected LLM models according to the backbone selection design.

steps_required.title: Implement Network Topology
steps_required.description: Set up the framework architecture and communication topology as specified.

steps_required.title: Implement Memory System
steps_required.description: Build the memory subsystem with the specified types, storage, and retrieval mechanisms.

steps_required.title: Implement Planning Module
steps_required.description: Develop the planning and reasoning capabilities according to the planning design.

steps_required.title: Define Agent Roles
steps_required.description: Implement each agent with its specified role, capabilities, and responsibilities.

steps_required.title: Integrate Tools
steps_required.description: Set up and integrate external tools and APIs as specified in the tool integration design.

steps_required.title: Implement Environment (if needed)
steps_required.description: Build the environment representation and grounding mechanisms if required.

steps_required.title: Implement Execution Semantics
steps_required.description: Set up the execution model, control flow, and concurrency handling.

steps_required.title: Implement Failure Handling
steps_required.description: Add failure detection, recovery mechanisms, coordination policies, and observability.
